author: Joseph Hutchinson
comment: A great looking watch face which is let down by a plain ambient mode. It would be better if the ticks and numbers were shown there.
title: Let down by ambient mode

author: Scott Bae
comment: Great clean look with a classic design yet modern touch. Just the pieces of data that I want quick access to. Best of all, battery life is amazing. Even with always on enabled and brightness of 3, the battery is only at 73% even after 10+ hours of normal use!

author: Austin Szilagyi
comment: Not a bad looking watch face by any means, but if you're going to charge for the app then there needs to be customization options available.

author: Ferdy Warganegara
comment: After installation...why not listed on my adroid wear apps?...I can not install it...what should I do?. I have Huawei Watch with Samsung S7 edge....pls reply asap...thx
title: Why not listed?

author: Alan Sack
comment: Nice graphics, but I need a square version for my Watch.

author: Kevin Jones
comment: Only option is to Install Settings.
title: Attractive but can't change Settings

author: Gary Parizek
comment: Another great watch face from North tribe.
title: Nice

author: Taylor Régis
comment: I bought it but had to ask for a refund. It was not showing up on my phone or Moto 360 watch. If this problem gets fixed I will reinstall it. Not happy though.
Loaded twice and cant find it anywhere
